argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> B e. TopBases ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> B ~<_ _om ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` B ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( x = B -> ( x ~<_ _om <-> B ~<_ _om ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = B -> ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( x = B -> ( ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) <-> ( topGen ` B ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( x = B -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) <-> ( B ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` B ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ ( B ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` B ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) -> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 8 | #P_syl12anc | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_is2ndc | |- ( ( topGen ` B ) e. 2ndc <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` B ) e. 2ndc ) |
